name: Rundll32 UNC Path Execution
description: Detects rundll32 execution where the DLL is located on a remote location (share)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\rundll32.exe OR process.pe.original_file_name:RUNDLL32.EXE OR process.command_line:*rundll32*) AND process.command_line:*\ \\\\\*)`
